incentives.description: Nerd Herd Intern: Show your support and get a rad badge!

unique.name: Digital 'Buy More' Badge
unique.description: A personalizable and customizable digital badge. Show it off on your profile and embed it in fansites and forums

unique.name: Campaign Updates
unique.description: Receive updates feed on the campaign's progress

incentives.description: Nerd Herd Junior Employee: Gain access to all the unlocked rewards and also the production blog.

unique.name: Production Blog
unique.description: Access to an exclusive update feed on the project's production.

unique.name: Unlocked Rewards
unique.description: Receive all the currently unlocked rewards as well as any unlocked before the campaign ends.

incentives.description: Nerd Herd Middle Management: All the perks of Level 1, plus exclusive production artifacts

unique.name: Digital Movie Download
unique.description: A digital copy of the movie when it comes out.

unique.name: Digital Storyboard Art
unique.description: A curated collection of exclusive storyboard art from the movie's production.

incentives.description: Nerd Herd C-suite: High up in the herd, every perk from before + tangible goods.

unique.name: Ticket Pre-order
unique.description: A ticket voucher that can be used at your local theater.

unique.name: Exclusive T-shirt
unique.description: One t-shirt. Choose from multiple, exclusive designs.
